## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                          | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Defines if the tab is active or not. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `text`   | `text`    | Define the text of the tab           | `string`  | `undefined` |
